languages.text: "Я должен вернуться. Враг мой ожидает меня, и бесчестьем было бы укрыться от этой битвы. Но в сражении мне понадобится помощь".
"I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."
languages.original_text: "Я должен вернуться. Враг мой ожидает меня, и бесчестьем было бы укрыться от этой битвы. Но в сражении мне понадобится помощь".

traits.locale_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."
"I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."
"I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."
"I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

languages.text: “我必须回去，我的宿敌还在等着我，逃避这场战斗是不光彩的行为。不过，我需要有人与我并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

traits.locale_text: “我必须回去，我的宿敌还在等着我，逃避这场战斗是不光彩的行为。不过，我需要有人与我并肩作战。”

languages.text: 「戻らなくてはならない。敵が俺を待ってる、この戦いから逃げ出したとなれば不名誉となる。だが、助けが必要だ」
languages.original_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

traits.locale_text: 「戻らなくてはならない。敵が俺を待ってる、この戦いから逃げ出したとなれば不名誉となる。だが、助けが必要だ」

languages.text: «Debo volver. Mi enemigo espera y sería deshonroso retirarme de esta batalla. Pero necesitaré ayuda para luchar».
languages.original_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

traits.locale_text: «Debo volver. Mi enemigo espera y sería deshonroso retirarme de esta batalla. Pero necesitaré ayuda para luchar».

languages.text: « Je dois y retourner. Mon ennemi m'attend et il serait déshonorant de lui refuser ce combat. Mais j'aurai besoin d'aide pour l'affronter. »
languages.original_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois y retourner. Mon ennemi m'attend et il serait déshonorant de lui refuser ce combat. Mais j'aurai besoin d'aide pour l'affronter. »

languages.text: "Ich muss zurückgehen. Mein Feind erwartet mich, und es wäre ehrlos, diesem Kampf auszuweichen. Aber ich werde dabei Hilfe brauchen."
languages.original_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss zurückgehen. Mein Feind erwartet mich, und es wäre ehrlos, diesem Kampf auszuweichen. Aber ich werde dabei Hilfe brauchen."

languages.text: "Geri dönmeliyim. Düşmanım beni bekliyor, bu savaştan çekilmek onuruma sığmaz. Fakat dövüşte yardıma ihtiyaç duyabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I must return. My foe awaits me, and it would be dishonourable to retreat from this battle. But I will need help in the fighting."

traits.locale_text: "Geri dönmeliyim. Düşmanım beni bekliyor, bu savaştan çekilmek onuruma sığmaz. Fakat dövüşte yardıma ihtiyaç duyabilirim."
